messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

service now unable to access surveys have we done our job well unable access surveys hello second issue being reported today our colleague advised she was having similar problem morning around could you please advise whether you already logged ticket for problem assigned please be advised if our colleagues able access feedback link properly response rate be impacted well reputation please have investigated with urgency looking forward for updates you best regards sent tuesday re have we done our job well dear order link give you feedback case need proper link since link below being transferred another link regards date tuesday have we done our job well your feedback needed fellow please tell how we fared takes only seconds your feedback here ticket reference summary correcting description sent monday resolution sent tuesday re correcting more info good know regardless scores you give we you take moment our work we would like say thank you every feedback you give reviewed by relevant recognize best or improve you might be contacted for details case needed if you want these surveys drop note we ll make happen although we be sorry let you go how we warm regards ext ref msg

message.reasoning:
**Categorizing IT ticket**

I need to categorize this IT ticket into one of the defined categories: Hardware, HR Support, Access, Miscellaneous, Storage, Purchase, Internal Project, or Administrative rights. The ticket seems to be about a user unable to access surveys and feedback links, which makes "Access" the most relevant category. It could also be "Miscellaneous," but "Access" is more specific. I’ll respond using the required JSON format: {"category":"Access"}.{"category":"Access"}
